text: Beauty seen is never lost, God's colors all are fast.
author: John Greenleaf Whittier

text: If the world could remain within a frame like a painting on the wall, I think we'd see the beauty then and stand staring in awe.
author: Conor Oberst

text: Unless action is taken soon - unless we can display the same vision of that earlier period - we will lose the treasure of California's open space and environmental beauty.
author: Adam Schiff

text: Remember always that the composer's pen is still mightier than the bow of the violinist in you lie all the possibilities of the creation of beauty.
author: John Philip Sousa

text: Grand opera is the most powerful of stage appeals and that almost entirely through the beauty of music.
author: John Philip Sousa
